Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 32nd overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Benjamin Berg (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/30/2015, off Benjamin Berg (PHI)...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/18/2015 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Won Gold Glove at Second Base in 2015...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/2016, hitting .548 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/2017, hitting .422 with 1 HR, 21 RBI...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2017, hitting .418 with 4 HR, 21 RBI...
Sets a new season AL-Record for Hits with 207 on 9/12/2017...
9/15/2017: Signed a contract extension with Cincinnati, $14,500,000 per year, for 4 years.
Won Player of the Week award on 9/18/2017, hitting .556 with 0 HR, 9 RBI...
Injured on 9/27/2017 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Won MVP in 2017, hitting .356 with 11 HR, 107 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against Colorado on 5/14/2018...
Drove in 6 runs against St. Louis (C) on 5/31/2018...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2018, hitting .348 with 5 HR, 20 RBI...
Sets a new season AL-Record for RBI with 120 on 9/15/2018...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/18/2018, hitting .429 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Sets a new season AL-Record for RBI with 121 on 9/18/2018...
Sets a new season AL-Record for RBI with 128 on 10/1/2018...
Won MVP in 2018, hitting .323 with 23 HR, 128 RBI...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Colorado on 7/17/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/2/2019, hitting .370 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2019...
Injured on 5/21/2020 with a Fractured Cheekbone, out for 6 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/2/2020, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against St. Louis (B) on 10/18/2020...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2020...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/22/2021, hitting .444 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/2021, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/2021, hitting .380 with 3 HR, 20 RBI...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
